attributes.action: unite with us against the advertising of 'Massage Services' in certain weekly Turkish Language Community Newspapers in the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is absolutely unacceptable to advertise such 'services' in these community newspapers, which are read by many young children and are a source of disgust and embarrassment to many of us in the Turkish speaking community.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
